about_the_game:
Gennady is a hardcore mix of blood-acid substrate and black-and-white comics. There's always something getting in the way before that damn soap opera ends. This time, or forever, the blinding glow of the screen is interrupted by the depressing view of an alien garbage dump. It's like that dream where you're on a crowded bus wearing nothing but your underpants. Only this time it's not a bus, son!

In this world, you have to fight your way through the neatly cube-shaped biomass with your own body in order to — no, not to grab and buy something on Black Friday — to survive. Unless the vile creatures are lucky, their pitiful bodies will be disintegrated by the blaster, and if they indeed are lucky, their squirming remains will be hanging on laundry ropes and poles.



These sticky pages of the gloomy comic book are hard to turn, because of the caked green sludge, but somewhere at the end of this story there must be a cozy picture of home. It would be nice to get there soon, because sometimes it makes you wanna stay here forever, or at least spend a weekend.




Use furious dash to overcome obstacles, destroy environment and alien scum. Destroy everything you see, accumulate dash, and destroy even more.




Build up rage and go on a rampage, carrying yourself brokenly through green slurry and guts. There is no speed limit. Play as fast as you can with skill and aggression.






Each of your new runs will consist of a randomly generated corridor, of pre-made rooms. Don't get lost! Or if you can't go any further, just fix the repeater and play from the next level.






Many grim and dangerous biomes each with unique game mechanics and visual style.
- Live a work shift in a meatpacking plant
- Don't eat too much in the cafeteria
- Don't get eaten in the woods
- Beware of debt collectors in the city
- Enjoy an audience with the queen






Kill everyone with more than two tentacles! But in addition to mollusks, the hierarchy of this world includes nasty parasites, creatures with bones, and huge arthropods. And the cherry on the cake of this outrage is the biome bosses. 




There are dangerous machinery, traps, and just plain unsuitable working conditions all around. And no union! It's not all that dangerous if you have enough fingers to push the buttons and your reflexes are fine. 






Incredible replayability. Collect useful junk and upgrades to strengthen your character and his ability to smash alien faces. Collect a unique combination of junk and perks to make each new run feel different.

In order to buy junk, don't skimp on the larva. Without them, you're worthless. But they won't sit around waiting for you to collect them either.





Replayable incredibility. Choose your own way of fighting back. Have a classic brawl, a laser show, or turn into a huge squirrel and smash everything around you. Don't forget to take Frienemies - special creatures that radically alter the run, granting both bonuses and debuffs.




Dive into a world drawn with hand drawn frame-by-frame animation, with a black and white palette and just black humor. Blood, noir and green slurry.

content_descriptors.notes:
In our game, the player can encounter illustrative and stylized scenes of violence, and more specifically: various brutal death scenes, murder with weapons, blood and meat.

The story includes reflections on life and death.

detailed_description:
Support us

Gennady is a hardcore mix of blood-acid substrate and black-and-white comics. There's always something getting in the way before that damn soap opera ends. This time, or forever, the blinding glow of the screen is interrupted by the depressing view of an alien garbage dump. legal_notice: Gennady registered as a trademark and meets all requirements
name: Gennady

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3 6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or higher

short_description: An old-school action platformer with rogue-lite elements. Imagine your grumpy neighbor blowing up the backside of an alien world with a blaster instead of resting after his shift. Blood, noir, and green slime.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
